SVGCircleElementCx.summary: The cx read-only property of the interface reflects the {{SVGAttr("cx")}} attribute of a {{SVGElement("circle")}} element and by that defines the x-coordinate of the circle's center.

remarks.para: If unspecified, the effect is as if the value is set to 0.

SVGCircleElementCx.value: An representing the x-coordinate of the circle's center.
